survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Customer Support Chatbots Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and experience with AI-powered customer support chatbots across various industries.

questions.question_text: How often do you interact with AI-powered customer support chatbots?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for mobile-friendly interaction.
